# Radiating Truthiness: Authenticity performances in politics in Brazil and the United States

This repository makes publicly available all the replication materials for the article "Radiating Truthiness: Authenticity performances in politics in Brazil and the United States".

### Addditional Materials

For additional information on the data collection, cleaning, and other replication materials please request access to the Authenticity Performances Private repository on GitHub.
